about.description: 9+ years of experience results oriended engineer, focused and related to all the necessary technologies to bring the project to life with JavaScript Angular, React, NodeJS, C#, .NET, unit tests, e2e and relational and non-relational databases. everything to provide the user with the best experience and functionality. I love working in a team, so I have experience leading teams using the scrum framework and virtual collaboration to succed on remote work, motivating and helping others create, build and learn new things. I am always looking for new challenges to broaden my knowledge and experience.
